name: Memories (itch) (spacepiano)
description:
A game about protecting your memories

You're fighting to protect the last memory you have left from all the lost souls who want to take it, but if you're not careful, you'll end up destroying the memory yourself. Made for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

How to play 

You control a soul (the purple one) trying to protect it's last memory (the picture).

You have to stop the lost souls (the red ones) from taking it, but the only way to do so is to go into 'power mode'. In this state, you can collect coins and destroy enemies, but you can also destroy your own memory with it, so be careful! You can also push the memory to get it out of harms way.

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys - Move

Space (hold) - enter power mode
